title: Ticket #1542: linux credd support for windows clients.
description:
Currently the manual outlines windows credd support only on a windows host, during some testing jiggery I could see that if you try to setup a windows client to store cred's on a linux credd it will fail because of message mismatch, plus possibly some other issues.

STORE_CRED unregistered command. it registers CREDD_STORE_CRED.

It would be advantageous in a mixed pool environment to setup a credd on the main CM, typically some industrial grade linux node.
remarks:
2011-Jun-08 14:52:38 by tstclair:
removed old linux credd and now cross compiles ye-olde-windows credd 6/8/2011

V7_7-credd_cleanup-publicbranch

2011-Jun-08 16:22:14 by tstclair:
